Glazed skin

Glazed Maven site skin

Glazed skin

The Glazed skin is a skin for Maven generated sites. It is derived from the Glazed template.

The site you are currently seeing is generated using this skin.

Usage

To use maven-glazed-skin as your Maven generated site skin, declare it in the site.xml descriptor:

<project>
  ...
  <skin>
    <groupId>net.ju-n.maven.skins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-glazed-skin</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.2</version>
  </skin>
  ...
</project>
